document_data.caption: A map showing Blaskos' Fine Carvings on the Way of the Dragon.
document_data.name: Blaskos' Fine Carvings
document_data.mainbody: '''Blaskos' Fine Carvings''' was a shop located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Dead Trades Ward}}
document_data.Description: The rear of the shop faced a small unnamed alley.
document_data.Location: Blaskos' Fine Carvings was located in the central section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]] on the west side of the [[Way of the Dragon (Waterdeep)|Way of the Dragon]] just east of [[Virgin's Square]].
